Crowd Counting

Source code and details

Reference: Cong Zhang, Kai Zhang, Hongsheng Li, Xiaogang Wang, Rong Xie　and Xiaokang Yang: Data-driven Crowd Understanding: a Baseline for a Large-scale Crowd Dataset. IEEE Transactions on Multimedia, Vol. 18, No.6, pp1048 - 1061, 2016.
Cong Zhang, Hongsheng Li, Xiaogang Wang, and Xiaokang Yang. “Cross-scene Crowd Counting via Deep Convolutional Neural Networks”. in Proceedings of IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition 2015.
